# NSAttributedString.DocumentReadingOptionKey

**Structure**

Options for constructing an attributed string from data you read from disk.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DocumentReadingOptionKey
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/DocumentReadingOptionKey] type defines attributes to use when creating an attributed string from data in a file. Use these strings with methods such as [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/init(data:options:documentAttributes:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/init(HTML:options:documentAttributes:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/init(URL:options:documentAttributes:)], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSMutableAttributedString/read(from:options:documentAttributes:)-5mbcx], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSMutableAttributedString/read(from:options:documentAttributes:)-54wth] to specify expected details. For example, specify the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/DocumentReadingOptionKey/documentType] attribute to interpret the file data as a specific file format.

## Getting the document options

- **baseURL**: The base URL for HTML documents.
- **characterEncoding**: The string encoding.
- **defaultAttributes**: The default attributes to apply to plain files.
- **documentType**: The document type.
- **fileType**: The file type.
- **readAccessURL**: The local files WebKit can access when loading content.
- **textEncodingName**: The text encoding to use.
- **textSizeMultiplier**: The scale factor for font sizes.
- **timeout**: The time, in seconds, to wait for a document to finish loading.
- **webPreferences**: A WebPreferences object.
- **webResourceLoadDelegate**: An object to serve as the web resource loading delegate.

## Getting the font-scaling options

- **sourceTextScaling**: The text-scaling mode to associate with the document’s content.
- **targetTextScaling**: The text scaling mode to use after reading the text from disk.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates a document reading option key with the specified raw value.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a document reading option key with the specified raw value.

## Type Properties

- **textKit1ListMarkerFormatDocumentOption**

## Getting document-wide attributes

- **NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey**: The attributes you apply to an entire document.
- **HTML attributes**: Documentwide attributes that provide control over the form of generated HTML.
- **NSAttributedString.DocumentType**: Constants for the document type document attribute key.
- **NSAttributedString.TextLayoutSectionKey**: Constants for the text layout sections document attribute key.
- **NSTextScalingType**: Constants that specify the text scaling.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
